body_html:
Will it be acceptable if I write a Python script to generate llvm.autogenerated.BUILD specifically for Tensorflow along with the output BUILD file to replace this generator script that I cannot see?

I may have a simpler fix. I working on a change that exports LLVM_COPTS, LLVM_DEFINES, LLVM_LINKOPTS, cmake_var_string, expand_cmake_vars and llvm_all_cmake_vars from llvm.bzl and changes all of the generated rules to obey these variables. This will let you put the windows customization logic in llvm.bzl which isn't autogenerated.
